name: TinyAuth
author: steveiliop56
description: TinyAuth is a simple authentication middleware that adds a login screen or OAuth (Google, GitHub, and custom providers) to all your Docker applications. It supports popular reverse proxies like Traefik, Nginx, and Caddy, providing an easy way to secure your self-hosted services with minimal configuration.

form_fields.label: Secret Key
form_fields.hint: Random 32-character secret key for session encryption

form_fields.label: Application URL
form_fields.hint: Full URL where TinyAuth will be accessible (auto-detected if empty)

form_fields.label: Application Title
form_fields.hint: Custom title displayed on the login page

form_fields.label: Users (Basic Auth)
form_fields.hint: Username:password_hash pairs separated by commas (use bcrypt hash)

form_fields.label: Session Expiry (seconds)
form_fields.hint: How long user sessions last before requiring re-authentication

form_fields.label: Cookie Secure
form_fields.hint: Enable secure cookies (recommended for HTTPS)

form_fields.label: Disable Continue Button
form_fields.hint: Hide the continue button on the login page

form_fields.label: GitHub OAuth Client ID
form_fields.hint: GitHub application client ID for OAuth authentication

form_fields.label: GitHub OAuth Client Secret
form_fields.hint: GitHub application client secret for OAuth authentication

form_fields.label: Google OAuth Client ID
form_fields.hint: Google application client ID for OAuth authentication

form_fields.label: Google OAuth Client Secret
form_fields.hint: Google application client secret for OAuth authentication

form_fields.label: Custom OAuth Provider Name

form_fields.label: Custom OAuth Client ID
form_fields.hint: Client ID for custom OAuth provider

form_fields.label: Custom OAuth Client Secret
form_fields.hint: Client secret for custom OAuth provider

form_fields.label: Custom OAuth Scopes
form_fields.hint: Space-separated list of OAuth scopes

form_fields.label: Custom OAuth Auth URL
form_fields.hint: Authorization URL for custom OAuth provider

form_fields.label: Custom OAuth Token URL
form_fields.hint: Token URL for custom OAuth provider

form_fields.label: Custom OAuth User URL
form_fields.hint: User info URL for custom OAuth provider

form_fields.label: OAuth Whitelist
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated list of allowed OAuth email domains

form_fields.label: OAuth Auto Redirect
form_fields.hint: Auto-redirect to OAuth provider (github, google, or generic)

form_fields.label: Background Image URL
form_fields.hint: Custom background image URL for login page

form_fields.label: Forgot Password Message

form_fields.placeholder: Contact your administrator to reset your password

form_fields.label: Login Timeout (seconds)
form_fields.hint: Maximum time allowed for login attempts
